title: The Little Sleep by Paul Tremblay
description:
Mark Genevich is a South Boston P.I. with a little problem: heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s narcoleptic, and he suffers from the most severe symptoms, including hypnogogic hallucinations. These waking dreams wreak havoc for a guy who depends on real-life clues to make his living.

Clients havenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t exactly been beating down the door when Mark meets Jennifer TimesÃ¢â‚¬â€daughter of the powerful local D.A. and a contestant on American StarÃ¢â‚¬â€who walks into his office with an outlandish story about a man who stole her fingers.

He awakes from his latest hallucination alone, but on his desk is a manila envelope containing risquÃƒÂ© photos of Jennifer. Are the pictures real, and if so, is Mark hunting a blackmailer, or worse?

Wildly imaginative and with a pitch-perfect voice, The Little Sleep is the first in a new series that casts a fresh eye on the rigors of detective work, and introduces a character who has a lot to proveÃ¢â‚¬â€if only he can stay awake long enough to do it.

Genre: Mystery
